Accommodations

Hotel Block

We have reserved a block of rooms at the Courtyard Marriott in San Ramon.

For information about how to reserve with our group rate click here or call 1-800-321-2211 and say you are “part of the King / Way Wedding Room Block group staying at the Courtyard San Ramon, located at 18090 San Ramon Valley Blvd, San Ramon, CA 94583.”

Reserve by Friday, May 19th for the group rate.

Booking early is encouraged!
